Please enter a word without special characters

First you are prompted to input words from a specific category. These categories can be lexical categories (like 'adjective' or 'verb'), but can also be more broad categories (like 'name' or 'body part'). These categories represent placeholders in a piece of text.

You can select one of the five pieces of text on the input screen. You then input a word (text only, so write numbers in text!) until you have filled all placeholders. After that you are presented with your funny story!

When the story is done, you can either load the previously saved text, or save this new text. You can also start a new game.

Tip: Play with two players (one inputs and one reads) for a more surprising story!
